screen_desc: The screenshot displays a smartphone home screen with a black wallpaper featuring blue and white colors. The screen shows icons for Gmail, Photos, YouTube, Phone, Messages, Chrome, and the Play Store. The Google search bar is at the bottom.
action_think: The user wants to empty the shopping cart on Costco and add LG Ultragear to the cart. To further assist the user, I should navigate to the Costco website and perform the required actions.
action_desc: Click on the Chrome browser icon
action_result: By scrolling up, I have opened the app drawer. This is necessary because to access the shopping cart on Costco, we must first open the Costco app.
